headline: Fortinet FortiSIEM Upgrade Highlights AI Security Push And Investor Questions
summary: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) has announced a major upgrade to its FortiSIEM platform, adding new threat detection tools and AI driven incident response. The update also introduces expanded data sovereignty options, aimed at customers with strict data residency and regulatory needs. For you as an investor looking at cybersecurity names, this move highlights how Fortinet is leaning further into security operations, not just perimeter defenses. FortiSIEM sits at the core of how enterprises monitor...
